comment.body: @Underd0g: sadly, that's what I see everywhere nowdays. Still there are kas, kaffie and many others who speak of unity and peace.
Now that's a feature I'll use! Thank you!
I think I2P works already, no? Or at least through yggdrasil it should work...
@Geekless: via. My English sucks too, but I like that "via"..

Well, I'd say in the world of IDEs there is no point in short names. Long names are self-explanatory, meaning new developer won't need to dig through half the codebase to understand a small portion of it.

And if it's not IP, it should not be called IP.

BUT renaming is a dangerous job, yea.. So it's more of a trilemma from my point of view xD

> How do other browsers respond to this?
+1 @geekless:
